text: hananim-ui uijilo geudeul-eul pae baesikigo dawis-eun gollias-eul salhaehaess eumyeo hananim-eun geuege gwonneung-gwa ji hyeleul jusigo hananim-ui tteus-eul galeu chisideola hananimkkeseo seologa seolo leul gyeonjetologhayeo inlyuleul bohohaji anihaessdamyeon i jiguneun myeolmanghaess-euli la geuleona hananim-eun on sesang-e chung manhan eunhyeleul bepuneun bun-isila
